document.full_text: an egyptian panel formed to uncover illicit gains acquired during the rule of deposed president hosni mubarak, will next week question his younger son about corruption, the state news agency said tuesday.
document.title: egypt corruption panel to quiz mubarak's son gamal
lines_and_colors: an egyptian panel formed to uncover illicit gains acquired during the rule of deposed president hosni mubarak, will next week question his younger son about corruption, the state news agency said tuesday.
